name: Web Spiders Pvt Ltd
description:
Web Spiders specializes in providing mobile & web engineering services, including large scale enterprise content management, web development utilizing latest technologies like HTML5 and Adobe Flex, and app development services for both smartphones and tablet devices. Their clients include well-known independent software vendors and marketers of Fortune 2000 companies.
The website of the company features detailed information on services and solutions offered on both web and mobile platforms, along with case studies and a blog showcasing their different projects. The company also maintains a strong presence on social media networks like Facebook and Twitter, through updates posted regularly on topics involving latest developments made in the fields of digital marketing and content management.
